column1: Meprobamate is a drug used to treat anxiety.

You may receive: - Activated charcoal - Breathing support, including tube through the mouth and breathing machine (ventilator) - Chest x-ray - EKG (heart tracing) - Fluids through a vein (by IV) - Laxative - Medication to treat symptoms - Tube from the mouth into the stomach to empty the stomach (gastric lavage)
